title: Enhance ralph-install wizard for golem-powers skills setup
description: Update the ralph-install wizard to guide new users through setting up golem-powers skills. This includes: installing Bun (for TypeScript skills), setting up API keys in 1Password, creating symlinks, and validating the installation.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Update skills/ralph-install/workflows/check-deps.md:
- Add check for Bun: command -v bun
- Add check for CodeRabbit CLI: command -v cr
Update skills/ralph-install/workflows/install-deps.md:
- Add Bun installation: brew install oven-sh/bun/bun
- Add CodeRabbit CLI installation: curl script
Update skills/ralph-install/workflows/setup-tokens.md:
- Guide user to create CONTEXT7_API_KEY in 1Password
- Guide user to create LINEAR_API_KEY in 1Password
- Provide op:// path format for each
Update skills/ralph-install/workflows/setup-symlinks.md:
- Create ~/.claude/commands/golem-powers symlink
- Remove old individual skill symlinks
Update skills/ralph-install/workflows/validate.md:
- Test: bun --version
- Test: cr --version
- Test: op read context7 key (if configured)
- Test: golem-powers symlink exists and is valid
Update SKILL.md to reflect new workflow steps
Test: Run /ralph-install on fresh machine simulation
Test: All validations pass after setup
Commit changes with message: feat/fix: [STORY-ID] description
